channel.title: QuackBot API on Quack Bot API Docs
channel.description: Recent content in QuackBot API on Quack Bot API Docs

item.title: Print Adder V2
item.description: Download PrinterAddV2.exe is a command line Click to Run file that will programmatically readd printers served from a print server to a set value! This is useful for when group policy doesn’t correctly add printers (which is a common issue with complicated, many or large GPOs) or if you want to have a shortcut to add many printers at once if you don’t want to add printers via GPO.

item.title: Minecraft
item.description: I Run a community Minecraft sever, over the 3 + Years we have made many builds. There will be a mix of community, Solo and mixed builds. I think the server started Dec 2020 with people actually playing Jan 2021 It’s a mostly Vanilla Spigot sever, with a couple of minor mods such as a bookshelf and Dynamap. The top players have many many hours combined, one of which has almost 60 days of playtime alone!

item.title: Botches and Bodges
item.description: Some stories of things going wrong, and the bodges that should never be talked about. Most of this is going to cover my time as an IT Technician in a school.. A Mixture of working as a All around tech in one of the best schools in the county (T1 on paper but I Basically did everything from changing toner to VLans) Then back to being a T1 Tech, this time in on of the biggest MATs in the country.

item.title: FiveM Scripts Docs And Versions
item.description: New FiveM Stuff. currently moved to More FiveM Machs Hunting | 0.0.6 MachsBD | 0.2.0 Machs Functions | 0.3.1

item.title: PowerShell
item.description: Welcome to MACHS Scripts. Here you will find a collection of scripts, mostly PowerShell, to help with Active directory management and other automation tasks. These scripts, unless otherwise specified, and licensed under GNU Affero General Public License v3.0 – Tips ExecutionPolicy When running these scripts, you may need to run the following command in PowerShell. This will allow you to run the script without a policy error. You can also add this as a parameter when setting up scheduled tasks.

item.title: The Archives
item.description: A Collection of Old Sites and Projects. Moved here as they no longer need to be there own site TechGuyBlog I Started a blog type thing with a few tech stories, like news style, but it seems more sensible to merge it here. dotRP_Docs The old Docs site for dotRP, contains the active docs for my FiveM Scripts
